hypervisorManager

Class VirtualBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • hypervisorManager.Hypervisor
      • hypervisorManager.VirtualBox

  • public class VirtualBox
extends Hypervisor
    Implementation of hypervisor abstract class to give support for VirtualBox hypervisor.
